sentence.Network_en: It seemed a singularly ill-judged enterprise for Truman to undertake.
sentence.Network_cn: 这对于杜鲁门来说似乎是一项特别不明智的事业。

sentence.Network_en: I can undertake that you will enjoy the play.
sentence.Network_cn: 我保证你会喜欢这个剧.

sentence.Network_en: We can't undertake that you will make a profit.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们不能保证你会获利.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 当字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 面对着〖 face;turntowards〗 承担〖 bear;undertake〗 主持〖 manage;takechargeof〗.
以u开头的英语英文单词 ... understood 的过去式；理解 undertake 约定，保证；从事 undertone 低音,浅色,小声.
347. vain a. 徒劳的，无效的348. undertake vt. 承担，着手做；同意，答应349. unique a. 唯一的，独特的
承的意思,承怎么读_在线字典 ... 承 chéng 承办〖 undertake;contracttodoajob〗 承包〖 contract〗.

list.abs: 会计词汇E ... business turnover 营业额 business undertaking 商业经营 business-friendly 方便商界；有利营商；利于商界运作.
常用英语新闻词汇[旺旺英语论坛] ... crude oil 原油 cultural undertakings 文化事业 curfew 宵禁.
社会热点问题 hot spots of society社会事业 social undertakings社会投资 nongovernmental investment
单一认诺(Single undertaking)为GATT/WTO回合谈判之决策原则，亦即谈判范围内所有议题必须达成共识，整体套案才算被会员一致 …

entry.def: When you undertake a task or job, you start doing it and accept responsibility for it.

example.ex: She undertook the arduous task of monitoring the elections.
example.tran: 她承担了监督选举的艰巨任务。

entry.def: If you undertake to do something, you promise that you will do it.

example.ex: He undertook to edit the text himself.
example.tran: 他答应亲自编辑正文的内容。

means.word_mean: 1. enter upon an activity or enterprise

auth_sentence.content: The commute was too painful to undertake very often.
auth_sentence.res_content: The commute was too painful to undertake very often.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The commute was too painful to undertake very often.

auth_sentence.content: Is the Bank likely to undertake any more QE?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is the Bank likely to undertake any more QE?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is the Bank likely to undertake any more QE?

auth_sentence.content: Hedonistic societies do not undertake to perform great accomplishments.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hedonistic societies do not undertake to perform great accomplishments.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hedonistic societies do not undertake to perform great accomplishments.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"在……下"; 2. "副手"; 3. 表示"不足,不够"

stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+handed手的→在底下做手脚
under不足,不够+develop发展+ed……的→发展不够
under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under不足,不够+populate移民于+ed表形容词→adj.人口稀少的
under不足,不够+sized大小的→不够大的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面

stems_affixes.value_cn: 大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生
stems_affixes.word_buile: under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面
under在……下+line线→在字底下划线,引申为强调

stems_affixes.value_cn: 承担, 担任, 许诺, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+take拿→在下面拿→承担, 担任

stems_affixes.value_cn: 签在……下, 给……保险, 签名, 承诺支付
stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+write写→v.签在……下, 给……保险, 签名, 承诺支付
under不足,不够+play玩→没玩够→说得不够的

Sentence.sentence: As America's first environmentalist, John Muir lived his life forever daring to undertake new adventures
You might expect that the student who had undertaken the most exhausted search would be the most satisfied with their final decision, but it turns out that's not true.

means.word_mean: 担任, 承揽,  从事, 负责; 保证

sentences.en: I want you to undertake all the responsibility.
sentences.cn: 我要你承担所有的责任。

sentences.en: Who will undertake the job of decorating the auditorium?
sentences.cn: 谁来负责装饰礼堂的工作?

sentences.en: I'll leave you to undertake an important mission.
sentences.cn: 我要让你承担一项重要使命。

sentences.en: He undertook the leadership of the team.
sentences.cn: 他担任了这个团队的领导。

sentences.en: If the equipment is not up to the agreed specifications and quality, we will undertake to replace them.
sentences.cn: 如果设备达不到议定的规格质量, 我们将负责调换。

sentences.en: I can undertake that you will enjoy the play.
sentences.cn: 我保证你会喜欢这个剧。

sentences.en: We can't undertake that you will make a profit.
sentences.cn: 我们不能保证你会获利。
他从事一项危险的工作。

sentences.en: Their team will undertake exploration for oil.
sentences.cn: 他们队将着手进行石油勘探工作。

sentences.en: She undertook to revise my compositions.
Next he undertook to pay off the debts.
sentences.cn: 然后, 他负责偿还债务。

jushi.english: He undertook the leadership of the team.
jushi.chinese: 他担任了这个队的领导。

jushi.english: Who will undertake the job of decorating the auditorium?
jushi.chinese: 谁来负责装饰礼堂的工作?

jushi.english: Only he could undertake this arduous task.
jushi.chinese: 只有他才能承担这项艰巨的任务。
